column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our waiter was friendly and patient with our large group.  But one there are a few things I've learned from doing tapas with large groups:  Someone needs to take charge of the group
column2: or everyone needs to chose 1-2 dishes
column3: AND there mustn't be any picky eaters in the group.  CBBR is good for groups
column5: but without some guidelines and willingness to try different foods
